Game.Name: Nacho Libre
Game.Plot: Nacho Libre is a video game for the Nintendo DS based upon the film of the same name. It was developed by Budcat Creations for Majesco and released in October 2006 in the US, and 2007 in Europe. The game was notable for its "Photo Puppety" art style, where still photos of characters from the film are used on 3D models.
